subject.name: Data Structure and Algorithms
subject.description: Introduces fundamental concepts of data structures and algorithms, including stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, and graphs. Focuses on algorithm design, analysis, and implementation of searching, sorting, and traversal techniques to enhance computational problem-solving skills.
objectives: To impart the basic concepts of data structures and algorithms
To understand concepts about searching and sorting techniques
To understand basic concepts about stacks, queues, lists, trees, and graphs
To enable students to write algorithms for solving problems using fundamental data structures

units.title: Introduction to Data Structures and Algorithms
topics: Basic Terminologies and Elementary Data Organizations
Data Structure Operations: insertion, deletion, traversal
Analysis of an Algorithm
Asymptotic Notations
Timeâ€“Space Trade-offs

units.title: Stacks and Queues
topics: Abstract Data Type (ADT) Stack and its operations
Algorithms and complexity analysis for stack operations
Applications of Stacks: Expression Conversion and Evaluation
ADT Queue, Types of Queues: Simple Queue, Circular Queue, Priority Queue
Operations on Queues and their analysis

units.title: Linked Lists
topics: Singly Linked Lists: Representation and Operations (Traversing, Searching, Insertion, Deletion)
Linked Representation of Stack and Queue
Header Nodes and Doubly Linked Lists: Operations and Analysis
Circular Linked Lists and their algorithms

units.title: Searching, Sorting, and Hashing
topics: Linear Search and Binary Search Techniques
Complexity Analysis of Search Algorithms
Sorting Algorithms: Selection Sort, Bubble Sort, Insertion Sort, Quick Sort, Merge Sort, Heap Sort
Comparison of Sorting Algorithms in Space and Time Complexity
Hashing: Concept and Performance Analysis

units.title: Trees and Graphs
topics: Tree Terminologies and Types: Binary Tree, Threaded Binary Tree, Binary Search Tree, AVL Tree
Tree Operations: Insertion, Deletion, Traversal, and Complexity Analysis
Applications of Binary Trees
B and B+ Trees: Definitions, Algorithms, and Analysis
Graph Terminologies and Representations
Graph Search and Traversal Algorithms: BFS and DFS
Graph Complexity and Applications

suggested_books: Fundamentals of Data Structures by Ellis Horowitz and Sartaj Sahni, Computer Science Press
Algorithms, Data Structures, and Problem Solving with C++ by Mark Allen Weiss, Addison-Wesley Publishing Company
How to Solve it by Computer by R.G. Dromey, Pearson Education
